highlightCode: import {Component} from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'nz-demo-drawer-header-job', template: ` <sc-drawer-header scRecordType="job" scRecordIconType="sc:briefcase" scAvatarThumbnailSrc="https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/1337607516008501250/6Ggc4S5n_400x400.png" scAvatarSrc="https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/1337607516008501250/6Ggc4S5n_400x400.png" scAvatarText="Tesla" scOptionalText="ID: 58050747 | Tesla" [scSwitchEntityEnabled]="true" > <ng-template #headerTitle> Tesla! </ng-template> <ng-template #infoLine> <sc-status-select [selectedStatus]="status" [statuses]="progressStatus" [showStage]="true" [showClosed]="true"></sc-status-select> <nz-tag class="tag">INTERVIEW</nz-tag> <sc-button scButtonSize="small" scButtonType="text" class="margin">Invoice Schedule</sc-button> <strong>$60000-$100000 per year</strong> </ng-template> <ng-template #quickActions> <div class="quick-actions"> <button nz-button nzType="text" nzSize="small"><i nz-icon nzType="mail" [nzTheme]="'fill'"></i></button> <nz-divider class="divider" nzType="vertical"></nz-divider> <button nz-button nzType="text" nzSize="small"><i nz-icon nzType="phone" [nzTheme]="'fill'"></i></button> <nz-divider class="divider" nzType="vertical"></nz-divider> <button nz-button nzType="text" nzSize="small"><i nz-icon nzType="message" [nzTheme]="'fill'"></i></button> <nz-divider class="divider" nzType="vertical"></nz-divider> <button nz-button nzType="text" nzSize="small"><i nz-icon nzType="pushpin" [nzTheme]="'fill'"></i></button> </div> </ng-template> <ng-template #actionMenu> <sc-button nzTrigger="click" nz-dropdown [nzDropdownMenu]="menu" nz-button scButtonType="default" scButtonSize="small" [(nzVisible)]="actionMenuOpen" scIconDirection="right" [scIconType]="actionMenuOpen ? 'up' : 'down'"> Actions </sc-button> <nz-dropdown-menu #menu="nzDropdownMenu"> <ul nz-menu nzSelectable> <li nz-menu-item>1st menu item</li> <li nz-menu-item>2nd menu item</li> <li nz-menu-item>3rd menu item</li> <li nz-menu-item nzDanger>4th danger item</li> </ul> </nz-dropdown-menu> </ng-template> <ng-template #tabMenu> <!-- special link tab-set where links are connected to the route--> <nz-tabset id="record-navigation-tab" [nzAnimated]="true" nzLinkRouter (nzSelectedIndexChange)="tabChanged($event)" > <nz-tab *ngFor="let tab of menuItems"> <a *nzTabLink nz-tab-link [routerLink]="['.']" [queryParams]="{ activeTab: tab.index }" queryParamsHandling="merge" > {{ tab.name }} <span *ngIf="tab.subTitle && tab.subTitle > 0">({{ tab.subTitle }})</span> <i *ngIf="tab.hasUnread" class="fa fa-circle">.</i> </a> </nz-tab> </nz-tabset> </ng-template> <ng-template #windowActions> <button nz-button nzType="text"><i nz-icon nzType="sc:side-panel"></i></button> </ng-template> </sc-drawer-header> `, styles: [ ` .margin { margin: 0 8px 0 0; } .quick-actions { display: inline-block; button[nzType='text'] { color: #8893a7; margin-right: 8px; } } .tag { margin-left: 8px; border: none; } i.fa.fa-circle { font-size: 25px; position: absolute; padding-left: 10px; color: #1971c2; top: -15px; } i.app-icon { font-size: 10px; vertical-align: baseline; } ` ] }) export class NzDemoDrawerHeaderJobComponent { status = { statusID: 8190, closed: false, default: true, name: 'Applied', rejected: false, stage: { stageID: 3402, name: 'New', progress: 'started', displayIndex: 1, default: false, forecast: 10 } }; progressStatus: any[] = [ { statusID: 8190, closed: false, default: true, name: 'Applied', rejected: false, stage: { stageID: 3402, name: 'New', progress: 'started', displayIndex: 1, default: false, forecast: 10 } }, { statusID: 8191, closed: true, default: false, name: 'Internal Interview 1', rejected: false, stage: { default: false, displayIndex: 2, forecast: 20, name: 'Internal Interview', progress: 'started', stageID: 3403 } }, { statusID: 11404, closed: true, default: false, name: 'Internal Interview 2', rejected: false, stage: { default: false, displayIndex: 2, forecast: 20, name: 'Internal Interview', progress: 'started', stageID: 3403 } }, { statusID: 8193, closed: false, default: false, name: 'Client Interview 1', rejected: false, stage: { default: false, displayIndex: 3, forecast: 30, name: 'Client Interview', progress: 'inprogress', stageID: 3405 } }, { statusID: 11571, closed: false, default: false, name: 'Awaiting after submission', rejected: false, stage: { default: false, displayIndex: 4, forecast: 40, name: 'Submitted', progress: 'started', stageID: 3404 } }, { statusID: 81901, closed: false, default: true, name: 'Applied 1', rejected: false, stage: { stageID: 3402, name: 'New', progress: 'started', displayIndex: 1, default: false, forecast: 10 } }, { statusID: 81902, closed: false, default: true, name: 'Applied 2', rejected: false, stage: { stageID: 3402, name: 'New', progress: 'started', displayIndex: 1, default: false, forecast: 10 } }, { statusID: 81903, closed: false, default: true, name: 'Applied 3', rejected: false, stage: { stageID: 3402, name: 'New', progress: 'started', displayIndex: 1, default: false, forecast: 10 } }, { statusID: 81904, closed: false, default: true, name: 'Applied 4', rejected: false, stage: { stageID: 3402, name: 'New', progress: 'started', displayIndex: 1, default: false, forecast: 10 } } ]; menuItems: any[] = [ {index: 0, name: 'Pipeline', value: 'pipelineJobApplication', subTitle: '10', hasUnread: false}, {index: 1, name: 'New', value: 'newJobApplication', subTitle: '25', hasUnread: true}, {index: 2, name: 'Placed', value: 'jobPlacement', subTitle: '', hasUnread: false}, {index: 3, name: 'Rejected', value: 'RejectedJobApplication', subTitle: '1', hasUnread: false}, {index: 4, name: 'Ads', value: 'jobAd', subTitle: '2', hasUnread: false}, {index: 5, name: 'Database', value: 'database', subTitle: '777', hasUnread: false} ]; actionMenuOpen: boolean; tabChanged(activeTab: number): void { this.menuItems[activeTab].active = true; } } export interface Status { statusID: number; name: string; closed: boolean; default: boolean; rejected: boolean; stage: Stage | null; } export interface Stage { stageID: number; name: string; progress: string; // possible value: inactive, started, inprogress, complete displayIndex: number; default: boolean; forecast: number; workflowCount?: number; usedInWorkflows?: Workflow[]; isDeleting?: boolean; } export interface Workflow { accountID: number; workflowID: number; name: string; placementType: string; isDefault: boolean; stages: WorkflowStage[]; userGroups: number[]; userGroupNames: string[]; } export interface WorkflowStage { stageID: number; displayIndex: number; progress: string; // possible value: inactive, started, inprogress, complete forecast: number; stage: Stage; }
